tiddler.title: Help On Font Styles
tiddler.pre: |Style|Formatting|h |''bold''|{{{''bold''}}} - two single-quotes, not a double-quote| |//italics//|{{{//italics//}}}| |''//bold italics//''|{{{''//bold italics//''}}}| |__underline__|{{{__underline__}}}| |--strikethrough--|{{{--Strikethrough--}}}| |super^^script^^|{{{super^^script^^}}}| |sub~~script~~|{{{sub~~script~~}}}| |@@Highlight@@|{{{@@Highlight@@}}}| |{{{plain text}}}|{{{ {{{PlainText No ''Formatting''}}} }}}| |/%this text will be invisible%/hidden text|{{{/%this text will be invisible%/}}}|
